text: Knut Andersen (born 20 July 1927) is a former Norwegian footballer. He played in three matches for the Norway national football team from 1949 to 1961. At club level, Andersen played for Frigg and Skeid, winning the Norwegian Cup twice with Skeid (1947 and 1958). He also played for Padova in Italy from 1951 to 1953.Padova-Knut hedret av Fotballmuseets Venner (6 December 2017).
